title: [SOLVED] @Riot 2 days past level 5 and still no premium hextech chest.
body:
Dear Riot,

My account is now 2 days past level 5 and still haven't recieved the premium hextech chest, also when i try to request a support ticket it would not work :( please help me im confused

replies.body: Hmmmm strange. I can see that you're passed level 5 so you should have gotten that chest already. Do me a favor and check for it again really quickly!
